mapper.insert: insert into mro_baojing (id, bj_quduandaihao, bj_guzhangdengji, bj_time, bj_huifu_time, bj_message, bj_status, bj_gz_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjQuduandaihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjGuzhangdengji,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bjHuifuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bjMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjGzStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select id, bj_quduandaihao, bj_guzhangdengji, bj_time, bj_huifu_time, bj_message, bj_status, bj_gz_status from mro_baojing where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
